trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Asheville

This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a lighted object rising up from a mountain to the southeast from my front door aroun 8:15 pm est. The light emitted (not blinking) was white, blue and red and it slowly rose from the top of the mountain and continued to climb slowly to a higher elevation. I used binoculars and saw a small light hovering in one area then moving slowly to a higher elevation. I took a video with a sony digital camera but was unable to view the object thru the display screen so I only got it on the very end of this video. the camera was moving not the object. The last frame shows the object on top with a small star below it.
Summary: light hovering over mountain for approx 1 1/2 hours
